name: dev.anotherai/anotherai
description: MCP server for building and testing AI agents with multi-model experimentation and insights.

examples.title: Compare Models
examples.description: Create an experiment to compare how different models extract sentiment from product reviews
examples.prompt: Create an experiment in AnotherAI that compares how GPT-5 mini and GPT-4 mini extract the sentiment from an input product review.

examples.title: Find Fastest Model
examples.description: Use AnotherAI to find the model that can summarize articles the fastest
examples.prompt: Use AnotherAI to help me find the model that can summarize a long article the fastest.

examples.title: Test Model Quality
examples.description: Test how clearly and accurately different models can answer complex STEM questions
examples.prompt: Use AnotherAI to test how clearly and accurately 5 different models can answer complex STEM questions.
